Value: 근력[/center]근력은 무게제한, 무기피해량에 영향을 주며[/left]근력 관련 기술 습득량에 영향을 줍니다.[/left][/left]%str 의 근력은, %ark 수준입니다.[/left][/pos:x=10,y=0]%dam[/pos:x=30,y=0]수정치가 맨손/무기 피해량에 추가됩니다.[/left][/pos:x=10,y=0]%enc[/pos:x=30,y=0]킬로그램이 최대 무게제한 수치입니다.[/left][/end]
지능[/center]지능은 마법 잠재력의 총량에 영향을 주며[/left]지능 관련 기술 습득량에 영향을 줍니다.[/left][/left]%int 의 지능은, %ark 수준입니다.[/left][/pos:x=10,y=0]%spc - %spt 주문 점수를 캐스팅에 사용 가능합니다.[/left][/end]
의지[/center]의지력은 주문 효과를 저항하는데 영향을 주며[/left]의지 관련 기술의 습득량에 영향을 줍니다.[/left][/left]%wil 의 의지력은, %ark 수준입니다.[/left][/pos:x=10,y=0]+%mad[/pos:x=30,y=0]수정치가 마법 저항력에 추가됩니다.[/left][/end]
민첩[/center]민첩성은 명중률에 영향을 주며, 피격을 피하고,[/left]민첩 관련 기술의 습득량에 영향을 줍니다.[/left][/left]%agi 의 민첩은, %ark 수준입니다.[/left][/pos:x=10,y=0]%thd [/pos:x=30,y=0]수정치가 전투시 계산에 추가됩니다.[/left][/end]

체력[/center]체력은 생명력과, 지구력, 회복 속도, 독과 질병 저항력에 영향을 줍니다.[/left][/left]%end 의 체력은, %ark 수준입니다.[/left][/pos:x=10,y=0]%hea [/pos:x=30,y=0]수정치가 레벨업시 추가 생명력에 추가됩니다.[/left][/pos:x=10,y=0]%hmd [/pos:x=30,y=0]가 회복 속도에 추가됩니다.[/left][/end]
매력[/center]매력은 매력 관련 기술의 습득량에 영향을 줍니다.[/left][/left]%per 의 매력은, %ark 수준입니다.[/left][/end]
속도[/center]속도는 이동 속도, 활 재장전 속도,[/left]모든 속도 관련 기술 습득에 영향을 줍니다.[/left][/left]%spd 의 속도는, %ark 수준입니다.[/left][/end]
행운[/center]행운은 모든 행동에 있어서 강력한 변수입니다.[/left]행운이 주요 능력치인 기술은 없지만,[/left]모든 기술의 성공 확률에 영향을 줍니다.[/left][/left]%luc 의 행운은, %ark 수준입니다.[/left][/end]
훈련에 %a 골드가 필요합니다.[/center]훈련을 받으시겠습니까?[/end]
%fcn 에 하나 있다고 들었습니다.[/end]
모르겠습니다.[/record]솔직히 말할게 없습니다.[/record]아는게 정말 없습니다...[/record]다른 사람한테 물어보시죠.[/record]모릅니다.[/end]
주문책에 아무 주문도 없습니다.[/end]
이 이름을 가진 곳이[/center]이 지도에 없습니다.[/center][/end]
보너스 점수를 모두 분배해야 합니다.[/end]

훈련을 더 받으려면[/center]적어도 12시간은 더 있어야 합니다.[/center][/end]

흡혈귀로서 살해를 통해 욕구를 충족해야 할 시간이 오래 지나버렸습니다.[/center]이제 힘을 회복할 수 없습니다.[/center][/end]
사유재산 같습니다.[/center]정말로 열어보시겠습니까?[/center][/end]
마차만 확인하고,[/center]%cn 안에 남아있습니까?[/center][/end]
마녀 두창에 감염되었습니다.[/center]근력, 체력, 생명력이,[/center]치료 전까지 점점 감소하며[/center]치료하지 않으면 사망합니다.[/center][/end]
역병에 감염되었습니다.[/center]아주 심각한, 치명적 질병입니다.[/center]몸에 매우 빠른 속도로 퍼지며,[/center]감염 후 치료하지 않으면,[/center]몇일 밖에 살 수 없습니다.[/center][/center][/end]
황열에 감염되었습니다.[/center]체력, 의지, 생명력이[/center]치료 전까지 매일 감소하며[/center]치료하지 않으면 사망합니다.[/center][/end]
장 부패병에 감염되었습니다.[/center]치료하지 않으면, 영구히 지속됩니다.[/center]증상은 매일 약간씩 생명력이[/center]감소하는 것입니다.[/center][/end]
폐결핵에 감염되었습니다.[/center]의지, 민첩, 근력이 느리게 감소하며,[/center]치료하지 않으면[/center]사망합니다.[/center][/end]
뇌염에 감염되었습니다.[/center]의지력, 생명력, 심지어 매력까지[/center]하루하루 빠져나갑니다.[/center]치료하지 않으면 죽음을 맞게 됩니다.[/center][/center][/end]
늪지병에 감염되었습니다.[/center]의지력, 민첩, 근력이,[/center]매일 감소하며, 치료하지 않으면[/center]죽게 됩니다.[/center][/end]
칼리론의 저주에 감염되었습니다.[/center]감염된 일부는 1~2주 정도면[/center]스스로 회복하기도 하지만, 근력,[/center]속도, 민첩이 감소됩니다.[/center]빨리 치료하는 것이 최선입니다.[/center][/end]
콜레라에 감염되었습니다.[/center]탐리엘에서 가장 위험한[/center]질병중 하나이며 치료를 받지 못하면,[/center]매우, 아주 빨리 죽게 됩니다.[/center][/end]
문둥병에 감염되었습니다.[/center]치료 받지 않으면,[/center]매일 조금씩 몸이 뭉그러집니다.[/center][/end]
상처 부패병에 감염되었습니다.[/center]근력, 체력, 생명력이 아주 느리게[/center]치료하기 전까지 약화됩니다.[/center][/center][/end]
적사병에 감염되었습니다.[/center]감염자의 체력과 매력을 매우 빨리[/center]무력하게 만드는 매우 심각한 병이며,[/center]치료받지 않으면 죽게 됩니다.[/center][/center][/center][/end]
혈액 부패병에 감염되었습니다.[/center]체력, 매력, 의지력에 몇일 혹은 몇주에[/center]걸쳐 치료되기 전까지 부정적인 영향을 줍니다.[/center]치료를 받지 못하면 사망할 수도 있습니다.[/center][/center][/center][/center][/end]
장티푸스에 감염되었습니다.[/center]위험한 질병으로 감염되면[/center]지능, 체력, 생명력에 영향을 주며[/center]치료를 받거나 죽기전까지[/center]증상이 계속 유지 됩니다.[/center][/end]
치매병에 감염되었습니다.[/center]감염자의 지능, 의지, 매력까지[/center]좀먹는 무서운 질병으로,[/center]치료되거나 죽기 전까지 낫지 않습니다.[/center][/center][/center][/end]
시간 질병에 감염되었습니다.[/center]마법적인 질병으로[/center]지능과 매지카 보유량이 매일 감소하게 됩니다.[/center]치료를 받지 않으면 죽게됩니다.[/center][/center][/end]

마법사열에 감염되었습니다.[/center]약간 아픈 정도일때도 있지만,[/center]극히 위험한 마법적인 질병이 되는 경우도[/center]있습니다. 감염된 일부는 걸린 줄 도 모르고[/center]지나가는 경우도 있지만 일부는 백치가 되는[/center]경우도 있습니다.[/center]내재 매지카량과 지능이 매일 흘러나가듯[/center]감소하며, 이는 3주 가량 지속됩니다.[/center][/center][/end]
중독되었습니다.[/center][/end]

Why did the %ra put the letters 'T.G.I.F.' on his boots? To remind himself - Toes Go In First![/record] Most %ra family trees don't fork![/record] What do a %ra and a bottle of port have in common? They're both empty from the neck up![/record] You know, you might be a %ra if you have grease under your toenails![/record] How do you get a %ra's eyes to sparkle? Put a torch in his ear![/record] You know, you might be a %ra if it's impossible to see food stains on your armor![/record] What did the %ra girl say after someone blew in her ear? 'Thanks for the refill!'[/record] What do you call a %ra with half a brain? Gifted![/record] Why do %ra women wear undergarments? To keep their ankles warm![/record] How do you make a %ra laugh on Morndas? Tell him a joke on Fredas![/record] You know, it only takes one drink to get a %ra drunk. I can't remember if it's the thirteenth or the fourteenth.[/record] What do you call a basement with more than one %ra? A WHINE cellar![/record] Over at the %nt, spitting will cost you a copper piece. But you can throw up for free![/record] What do a smart %ra and an orcoblin have in common? They're both extinct![/record] You know, lots of people say that %ra kids procrastinate too much. Well, just you wait![/record] What is a %ra doing when he holds his hands tight over his ears? Trying to hold a thought![/record] How can you tell if a %ra is lying? His lips are moving![/record] What do you say to a %ra woman to convince her to go to bed with you? Have another ale![/record] Why is it %cn has the most %ra adventurers, and %cn2 has the most goblins? %cn2 had the first choice![/record] What is the first thing a %ra woman does in the morning? Walk home![/record] What did the %ra woman say after she was told she was pregnant? 'Is it mine?'![/record] What a %ra lacks in intelligence, he makes up for in stupidity.[/record] I won't eat anything that has intelligent life, but I will happily eat a politician or a %ra.[/end]

Value: "이곳 %cpn 은,[/center]%cn 에서 가장 싼 곳입니다.[/center]흥정 하시려는게 끝이 안보이지만[/center]최대한 깎아서 %a 골드에 드리겠습니다."[/center][/center][/record]"손님, 정말 끈질기게 흥정하시는군요.[/center]이제 끝을 냅시다. 원래 이보다는 더 받지만,[/center]손님께는 특별히 %a 골드에 모시겠습니다.[/center]정말 이 정도면 푼돈이죠."[/center][/center][/end]
"흥정은 이제 그만합시다. %a 골드.[/center]사던지 말던지 마음대로 하시오."[/record]"%a 골드.[/center]맞춰준 값이요."[/center][/record]긴 흥정의 시간후...[/center]"%a 골드로 합시다 더이상 안됩니다."[/center][/end]

"이 끝없는 흥정은 이정도로 합시다.[/center]정말 급하신가 봅니다.[/center]내가 보통 이보다는 적게 주는데,[/center]특별히 %a 골드로 합시다."[/center][/record]"자, 내가 손해 안보는 선에서[/center]최대한 많이 주려고 하는 겁니다.[/center]%a 골드 어떻습니까. 이 정도면 댁 친구들한테[/center]가게 털어먹었다고 떠들어도 될거요."[/center][/record]"내 가족과 가장 친한 친구들한테만 주는 가격인데[/center]시장가격이야 이것보다는 훨신 낮지만,[/center]이 정도면 될 것 같은데[/center]%a 골드요."[/center][/record]"물건 괜찮군, 괜찮아. 보통 이것보다는[/center]적게 주지만, 댁한텐 특별히 %a 골드로 하십시다.[/center]더이상 흥정할 수 없는 최선의 가격이요.[/center][/end]

"어디 다른 가게에서 %a 골드[/center]이상 받을 수 있을지 모르겠습니다만,[/center]이 정도도 좋은 가격이고, 더이상 깍아 드릴 수 없습니다."[/center][/record]"%a 골드 드릴 수 있겠습니다.[/center]누구 다른 사람이 더 줄 수 있다고 하면,[/center]거기로 가시는게 좋겠군요.[/center]%a 골드가 제쪽에선 최선입니다."[/center][/record]"이런 물건은 그닥 잘 팔리진 않지만,[/center]팔 수 는 있습니다. %a 골드 드리지요.[/center]이정도면 완전히 공정한 가격입니다."[/center][/record]"예, 맞습니다. 아무리 봐도 좋은 물건 입니다.[/center]정상 가격에서 약간 더 드릴 수 있겠습니다.[/center]%a 골드"[/center][/end]

"댁한테 볼 시간 없습니다. 이런 쓰레기는[/center]%a 밖에 못줍니다."[/record]"%a 골드다 애송이. 팔던지 말던지."[/center][/record]"어줍잖은 흥정할 생각 마라, 아가야.[/center]%a 골드 주마, 이게 최고가니까[/center]더이상 흥정할 생각 하지마."[/center][/record]"자, %ra. 그쪽이나 나나 이게 %a 골드 이상은[/center]못 받는다는거 알고 있잖습니까?[/center]더 이상 아닌 척은 하지 맙시다.[/center]물론, 동의 안해도 상관은 없지만, 난 이렇게 밖에 못줍니다."[/center][/end]
문 안으로 들어서자 좋은 향 냄새와 부드러운[/center]음악에 몸의 긴장이 풀립니다. 가게 안의 물품들은[/center]세심하게 배치되어 있으며,[/center]그 어떤 물건도 흠잡을 곳이 없어 보입니다.[/center][/end]
이 상점은 다른 곳 보다 물건이 잘 갖춰져 있습니다.[/center]상품들이 매대에 가지런히 놓여있습니다.[/center]왕실에 진상될 정도는 아니지만,[/center]모두 잘만들어진 물건입니다.[/center][/end]

축하합니다 일리악 만의 어디로든[/center]타고 갈 수 있는 튼튼한 배를 구매 했습니다.[/center][/end]

%pcn, 본점의 기존 대출을[/center]부도처리 하신 상태입니다. 본점에서는[/center]이제 어떠한 상황에서도 대출을 받을 수 없습니다.[/center]아니면 %reg 지역이 아닌 다른 지역의 은행으로 가서[/center]사기 대출을 해보시던지요.[/center][/center][/end]

정중히 사과 드립니다만, 고객께선[/center]계좌에 그만한 금액이 없으십니다.[/center][/end]
현재 보유하신 모든 수표를[/left]입금 하시려는 것이 맞습니까?[/end]
계좌에 잔액이 부족합니다.[/center]수표 인출을 하려면 액면 금액에 추가로[/center]1 퍼센트의 수수료가 더 있어야 합니다.[/center][/end]
본점에선 100 골드 미만의 금액에 대해선[/center]수표 발행을 하고 있지 않습니다.[/center][/end]
정말 감사하지만, 초과 상환은[/center]받지 않습니다. 여기 남은 잔액 입니다.[/center]대출은 완전히 상환되었습니다.[/center][/end]
죄송하지만, 고객님의 평판으로는[/center]그정도의 골드는 대출해 드릴 수 없습니다.[/center]%ml 골드가 대출 한도입니다.[/center][/end]
100 골드 미만의 대출은 해드릴 수 없습니다.[/center][/center][/end]

플레이어 반응속도는 게임의 전체적인 속도를 결정하게 됩니다.[/center]매우 빠른-VERY HIGH, 반응 속도를 선택하면 괴물이 더 빠르게,[/center]이동하고 공격하게 되며, 그에 맞춰 플레이어도 빨리 컨트롤해야 합니다.[/center]매우 느린-VERY LOW, 반응 속도를 선택하면 괴물도 더 느리게,[/center]이동하고 공격하게 되며, 더 조심스럽게 생각하는 플레이를 할 수 있게 됩니다.[/center]느린 반응속도를 선택하면 캐릭터 레벨업이 느려지며 빠른 반응속도에는 빨라집니다.[/center][/end]

You pass a smoldering campfire.[/record]
A sign warns, "Trespassers Beware".[/record]
An owl hoots softly nearby.[/end]

Steam rises from cracks in the earth.[/record]
A hot spring bubbles nearby.[/record]
A path winds off among the boulders.[/end]

You pass a shallow sandy pit.[/record]
Scorpion tracks crisscross the area.[/record]
A loud rustling startles you.[/end]

You smell freshly buried dead.[/record]
Wagon ruts lead off a ways.[/record]
White flowers litter the path.[/end]
도둑 길드에서 재판관에 뇌물을 줬고,[/center]무죄가 판결 되었습니다.[/center][/end]
다크브라더후드에서 재판관에게 뒷돈을 건넸고,[/center]판결은 무죄가 되었습니다.[/center][/end]

음, 일이 있긴 했습니다만,[/center]파이터 길드에 맡겼습니다.[/record]그 입 가벼운... 그 누구가[/center]제가 도움이 필요하다고 떠벌렸나 봅니다.[/center]아무 도움도 필요 없습니다.[/record]너무 늦었습니다. 일은 다른[/center]마검사에게 맡겼습니다.[/center][/record]아, 일이 있었긴 했습니다만.[/center]일이 알아서 풀렸습니다. 어쨌든 고맙군요.[/center][/end]

좋습니다, 메이지 길드에 걸맞는 인재이군요.[/center]이곳에서 수습생으로 활동하면서, 주문제작을 활용할 수 있고,[/center]길드에서 가르치는 기술 교육을 받을 수 있습니다.[/center]나중에는, 도서관을 사용할 수 있게되고,[/center]마법 물품을 사거나, 직접 만들 수 있게 됩니다.[/center]가입에 관심 있습니까?[/center][/end]

정말 안타깝지만 길드에 가입할 수 있는[/center]조건이 되지 않은 것 같습니다.[/center][/center]이곳에선 적어도 하나의 마법 분야 기술에 대해[/center]어느 정도 능숙해야만 인원으로 받고 있습니다.[/center][/record]정말 안타깝지만 길드에 가입할 수 있는[/center]조건이 되지 않은 것 같습니다.[/center][/center]우린 마법 초심자는 받지 않습니다.[/center]적어도 하나의 마법 분야의 기술에[/center]어느 정도 노력을 한 인재만 받습니다.[/center][/record]정말 안타깝지만 길드에 가입할 수 있는[/center]조건이 되지 않은 것 같습니다.[/center][/center]여섯 마법 분야 기술중 적어도 하나에[/center]시간과 노력을 바쳐 갈고 닦는다면[/center]가입을 다시 고려해 보도록 하겠습니다.[/center][/end]

정말 안타깝지만 길드에 가입할 수 있는[/center]조건이 되지 않은 것 같습니다.[/center][/center]직설적으로 말해서, 학식을 갖춘 자들 사이에[/center]댁의 평판이 훌륭한 편이 아닙니다.[/center][/record]정말 안타깝지만 길드에 가입할 수 있는[/center]조건이 되지 않은 것 같습니다.[/center][/center]솔직히 말해 댁의 이름은 잘 알고 있으나, 좋은 이름으로 알려진게 아닙니다.[/center][/record]정말 안타깝지만 길드에 가입할 수 있는[/center]조건이 되지 않은 것 같습니다.[/center][/center]안타깝지만, 댁의 평판이 훌륭한 편이 못됩니다.[/center]젊은 %ra 친구.[/center]그 점을 개선해서 다시 찾아 주십시오.[/center][/end]
축하합니다, %pcn.[/center]%lev 진급이 결정되었습니다.[/center]그에 걸맞는 특전과 명예가 따르게 됩니다.[/center]기억해두십시오, 브라더후드에선[/center]과거의 업적에 안주하지 않는다는 것을.[/center][/end]

%lev 의 직위로 격하됨을 공식 통보하는 것이[/center]제 의무가 되겠습니다.[/center]%pcf, 다시 한번 상기시켜 드리자면[/center]과거의 성취에 만족하지 않고 더욱 노력하는 것이[/center]우리 조직원으로서 요구되는 바임을 알려드리겠습니다.[/center][/record]강등을 알려드리게 되어 안타깝습니다.[/center]%pcn.[/center][/record]원로들께서 실망하셨습니다. %pcn.[/center]강등 되었습니다.[/center][/record]강등 되었습니다. %pcn.[/center]알려드리게 되어 안타깝습니다.[/center][/record]당신의 일처리를 원로들께서 아셨습니다.[/center]%pcn. 그분들께서 강등을 명하셨습니다.[/center][/record]원로들께서 무능력한 공헌에는 강등이 있음을[/center]명하셨습니다, %pcn.[/center][/record]원로들께서 무능함에 직위의 격하로서 답하셨습니다.[/center]이를 마땅히 받아들여야 할 것입니다.[/center][/center][/end]

%pcn, 최근 조직에 실망을 주어왔는바.[/center]이제부터 조직원으로서 주어지는 혜택에[/center]걸맞지 않게 되엇습니다.[/center]다시 들어오게 될지도 모르나,[/center]지금 당신은, 파문이오.[/center][/record]이곳에서 아무것도 할 수 없습니다, %pcn.[/center]원로들께서 추방을 결정하셨습니다.[/center][/record]평판을 지킬 수 있을 정도의 연줄이[/center]없었던 모양입니다.[/center]%pcn, 그대는 추방이오.[/center][/record]그간 쌓아온 모든 명예와 혜택은 박탈[/center]되었습니다, %pcn. 추방임을 아시오.[/center][/end]

파이터 길드는 값을 지불한다면 누구에게든[/center]잘 무장된 강인한 전사를 파견할 준비가 되어 있지.[/center]꾸준히 일을 받아 금화를 벌고 싶다면, 파이터 길드지.[/center]기사단 것들 보다 훨씬 낫고 말고. 그거 압니까[/center]거기는 일해주고도 돈도 안받는다고 하더군.[/center][/center][/record]파이터 길드는 구인하는데 까다롭지 않다는 평판이[/center]있지. 실제로도 다르지 않지만. 댁은 파이터 길드조차[/center]좋지 않는 눈으로 보는 상태요. 그쪽의 이름값이[/center]상태가 좋지 않으니 어떻게 해보고 그 후에야[/center]길드 가입을 이야기 해볼 수 있을 것 같소.[/center][/center][/end]
%ra, 미안하지만. 파이터 길드에선 진짜 전사를[/center]찾고 있는데. 무기에 대해 좀 배우고 난 후에 다시[/center]서 봅시다, 알겠소?[/center][/end]
좋아, 파이터 길드에서 쓸만한 전사인 것 같군.[/center]여기선 기술 훈련과 특별히 할인된 갑옷과 무기 수리,[/center]그리고 아주 짭잘한 일거리 알선을 제공하지.[/center]추가로 어느 파이터 길드에서든지 무료로[/center]잠자리가 제공된다네.[/center]관심 있나?[/center][/center][/end]
훌륭하군. 파이터 길드에 들어온 걸 환영하네,[/center]%pcf. %lev 등급으로 시작하게 되네.[/center][/end]
축하하지, %pcf. 뛰어난 무기 기량으로[/center]길드에서 %lev 등급으로 승격되었어.[/center]기존 혜택에, 추가로 무기 수리가 더 저렴하게[/center]제공되고, 더 짭잘한 일거리를 제안 받을 수[/center]있을거야.[/center][/center][/end]
마음씨가 돈주머니보다 크십니다.[/center]%gii 골드 밖에 없으십니다.[/center][/record]안타깝지만 가진게 %gii 골드 밖에 없으십니다.[/center][/record]%gii 골드 밖에 주실 수 없습니다.[/center]그게 그쪽이 가지고 계신 전부입니다.[/center][/end]

디벨라께서 차후 몇일 간 그대의 행운에[/center]축복을 내리실 겁니다.[/center][/end]
스텐다르께서 차후 몇일 간 그대의 평판에[/center]축복을 내리실 겁니다.[/center][/center][/end]
키나레스께서 차후 몇일 간 그대의 체력에[/center]축복을 내리실 겁니다.[/center][/end]

도둑 길드는 강도, 창부, 다른 건달들이 모인 조직입니다. 그들의 본부는 아무도 모르죠.[/record]길드에 속하지 않은 뚜쟁이, 소매치기, 빈집털이, 사기꾼, 강도들이 있긴 하지만, 탐리엘에서 가장 조직적인 범죄자들은 도둑 길드 소속입니다. 집단의 소속이라는게 이점이 있는데다, 도둑 길드가 가입하라고 어떤... 압박을 주기 때문이지요.[/record]사실상 탐리엘의 거의 모든 중소 도시, 마을, 대도시에는 이 전문적인 범죄집단이 서로 보호해주면서 뿌리를 내리고 있다는 겁니다.[/record]도둑 길드는 다른 길드와 똑같습니다. 그저 전문이 범죄일뿐인 겁니다. 조직원에게는 특별한 혜택과 관리들에게 뇌물을 찔러넣고, 비 조직원을 처벌하죠. 다른 길드하고 똑같습니다.[/end]

메이지 길드는 탐리엘에 있는 마법 연구의 공식적인 중심지입니다. 대부분의 주요 도시에는 길드 지부가 있어서 주문과 마법 물품을 판매하고, 추가로 관련 훈련도 제공합니다.[/record]메이지 길드는 마법을 배우는 학교 비슷한 곳입니다. 가입하는 것부터 어느정도 마법을 해야하지만, 가입하지 않아도 이용할 수 있는게 몇몇 있습니다.[/record]메이지 길드는 이름 그대로 인 곳입니다. 모든 종류의 주문 사용자들이 모여 서로를 가르치는 조직입니다. 마법사들이 혼자서 연구하던 시절도 있었지만, 이젠 아닙니다.[/record]생각 하는 그대로 일겁니다. 원래 마법을 좀 하는 마법사들이 모여서 더 마법을 잘하려고 만든 학교이자 조직이죠. 대충 설립된지 2천년쯤 되었습니다.[/end]

다크 브라더후드는 아주 비밀스런 집단으로, 효율적인 것을 좋아하는 군주들이 암살자로 자주 고용하는 집단 입니다. 광적인 데이드라 신봉자들로 유명하지만, 일은 제대로 처리합니다. 수천년 전쯤 부터 있었다고 합니다.[/record]종교적 집단으로 위장하고 있는 암살자 조직입니다.[/record]탐리엘에서 거의 공식적일 수준으로 잘 알려진 암살자 길드입니다. 거의 모든 왕국에서 불법 집단으로 규정되어 있지만, 말이 규정이지...[/record]대충 종교 집단이긴 하지만, 사원하곤 다릅니다. 단검을 들고 피에 대해 명상하는 성직자들을 생각해 보면 됩니다.[/record]

대부분의 조직들이 비밀스럽지만, 블레이드는 거의 알려진게 없습니다. 가문이 유지되어 세대에 걸쳐 훈련되는 탐리엘에서 최고의 전사들이라는 소문이 있습니다. 이들의 목적은 아무도 모릅니다.[/record]있는지 조차 알수 없고, 만약에 존재하고 그 전설이 사실이라면, 온 탐리엘에서 최고의 전사들일 겁니다.[/record]기사단 같은거긴 하지만, 다른 기사단하고는 다르게 충성을 바치는 대상을 아무도 모릅니다. 완전히 수수께끼의 집단입니다.[/record]이렇게 대놓고 블레이드에 대해서 물어보시면 안됩니다. 모두들 탐리엘에서 최고의 전사라는건 알지만, 무슨 목적의 조직인지 아무도 모르고, 그게 무서운 점입니다.[/end]

네크로맨서들은 메이지 길드의 어두운 정반대 같은건데, 가장 부도덕한 데이드릭 주문의 대가들인 강력한 매지카 사용자들입니다. 땅벌레의 왕으로 알려진 남자가 이끈다고 합니다. 가장 유명한 소문으로는 수천살을 먹은데다 늙지 않는다고 합니다.[/record]네크로맨서들에 대해선 말을 안하는게 좋습니다. 메이지 길드와는 다르게 이들은 단 하나의 목적만을 위해 행동합니다. 무서운 이야기가 많지만, 이들의 진정한 목적은 아무도 모릅니다.[/record]네크로맨서들은 마법사들이지만 메이지 길드와는 다르게 아주 아주 비밀스럽습니ㄷ. 이들의 목적과 활동은 잘 알려져 있지만, 네크로맨서들에 대해 제대로 아는 이는 아무도 없습니다.[/record]오래된 말로 네크로맨서들에게 대들면, 죽음보다 무서운 결말을 무서워해야 한다는 말이 있습니다. 무서운 마법사들이며, 고결함과는 거리가 먼 자들입니다.[/end]

언더킹은 어린아이들에게 해주는 이야기에 나오는 괴물 같은 건데, 역사상 가장 강력한 마법사였답니다. 셉팀 왕조의 가장 초기 연대까지 이야기가 올라갈 정도죠. 물론 자칭 언더킹의 사도라는 자들은 그의 존재를 의심치 않는데, 이 언더킹에게 충성을 바친다는 살아있거나 죽어도 움직이는 자들은 수백 정도 뿐일겁니다.[/record]언더킹은 리치 같은 겁니다. 아주 강력하고, 아주 비밀스러운 고대 리치죠. 목적이 뭐고 얼마나 오래 된 리치인지는 아무도 모릅니다.[/record]들리는 이야기로는, 언더킹은 한때 강력한 마법사로 어떤 위업을 달성하기 위해 자신의 심장을 바쳤다고 합니다. 그 심장이 사라지자, 언더킹은 죽지도 못하지만 그렇다고 제대로 살아있을 수 도 없게 되었고, 광적인 충성을 바치는 부하들만이 남아 그의 심장을 찾고 있다고 합니다.[/record]언더킹은 이제 그저 전설속의 존재일지도 모르지만, 그 부하들은 진짜 존재합니다. 탐리엘의 백성이라면 언더킹이 있다고 믿고, 매우 무서워 합니다.[/end]

파이터 길드는 용병 업무에 전문화된 곳 입니다. 모험가들을 경비, 경호 임무를 알선하고 그리고 종종 좀 더 비밀을 요하는 임무에도 고용합니다.[/record]그저 일 찾는 경비병 들입니다, 비밀도 낭만이 있는 일도 아니죠.[/record]파이터 길드는 이름 그대로 일을 찾는 용병 집단입니다.[/record]파이터 길드는 경비, 경호, 무슨 일이든간에 골드가 있는 사람이 있는 곳 어디에든 있습니다. %reg 에 뭔가 일이 터져 해결해야한다면 반드시 필요한 사람들입니다.[/end]
램프 기사단은 메이지 길드의 구성원 중 전투가 전문이 아닌 자들을 지키기로 결의한 자들이 모인 기사단입니다.[/end]
Not much is known about the Cabal of the Mages Guild. It is generally supposed that their power comes from summoning great Daedra lords and princes.[/end]

The Order of Arkay is a religious order dedicated to the worship of Arkay, the God of the Cycle of Birth and Death.[/record]
That's the temple devoted to Arkay, the God of Birth and Death.[/record]
The Order of Arkay is a temple for worshippers of the God of the Cycle of Birth and Death.[/end]

Any temple dedicated to Zenithar, the God of Work and Commerce, is called a Resolution of Zenithar or a Resolution of Zen.[/record]
A Resolution is the fancy name the priests of Zenithar give to their temples.[/record]
Zenithar is the God of Work and Commerce. A no-nonsense kind of deity, and His temples are so headstrong, they're called Resolutions.[/end]

Temples devoted to the Mother-Goddess Mara are customarily called Benevolences because she is also the Goddess of Love.[/record]
A Benevolence is any temple devoted to the Mother-Goddess, Mara.[/record]
Mara's temples are called Benevolences, just like the God of Work and Commerce calls His temples Resolutions. She's the Mother-Goddess and the Goddess of Love, so it makes sense in a way.[/record]

The Akatosh Chantry is one of the temples dedicated to the Dragon, the God of Time, Akatosh.[/record]
The priests of Akatosh always call their temples chantries. I suppose it's because they do a lot of singing there.[/record]
Akatosh is a Dragon God of Time, and the temples devoted to Him are always called Chantries.[/end]

Julianos is the God of Wisdom and Logic, and His temples are called Schools.[/record]
They don't really worship Julianos at His temples, but since He is the God of Wisdom, they run the temples more like academies. That's why they call them Schools, not temples.[/record]
The School of Julianos is one of the top research institutions in Tamriel, probably second only to the Mages Guild. There's a lot of rivalry between the Mages and the scholars of Julianos, actually.[/end]

The Temple of Stendarr is dedicated to the God Stendarr, the Patron of Mercy. They are among the greatest charitable institutions in the land.[/record]
Stendarr is the God of Mercy and His temples attempt to carry His message of peace to all Tamriel. You can judge their success for yourself.[/record]
The cult devoted to the God of Mercy and Peace is called the Temple of Stendarr. Say what you want about them, they have an honest vision of a peaceful Tamriel.[/end]

Kynareth is the Goddess of the Air, and Patron Spirit of many places, including the kingdom of Daggerfall. Her temples are widespread and her worship popular.[/record]
The Temple of Kynareth worships the Goddess of the Air, the spirit who supposed first gave Morihaus the Lord's Mail.[/record]
The priests and priestesses of the Goddess of the Air gather their to pray to their patroness.[/end]
The Knights of the Circle are the protectors and guardians of the Order of Arkay. They are as dedicated to Him as His priests are.[/end]
The Knights of Iron are dedicated to the God of Commerce, Zenithar. They protect the members of His Resolution from those who would disrupt their trade.[/end]
The Maran Knights are those warriors who have dedicated their swords to the Mother Goddess Mara. They are sworn to protect her cause and Her Benevolences in Tamriel.[/end]
The Order of the Hour is the group of knights sworn to Akatosh, the Dragon God of Time. They work to further His cause and protect His Chantries.[/end]

The Knights Mentor are those bound to follow the call of Julianos, the God of Wisdom and Learning. While the Schools of Julianos do most of the actual teaching, the Knights Mentor protect the sages and fight the ubiquitous forces of ignorance.[/end]
The Order of the Lily are the knights sworn to the ideal of Dibella, Goddess of Beauty. They protect, and when necessary, die prettily for her Houses.[/end]
The Crusaders are the knights of Stendarr, God of Mercy. They protect the Temples of Stendarr and act as his compassionate blade when the situation demands.[/end]

The Kynaran Order is composed of knights who have dedicated themselves mind, body, and sword to the Goddess of the Air, Kynareth. They are most often in the company of Her priests of the Temple of Kynareth.[/end]
The Knights of the Dragon are composed of the finest knights of the Daggerfall militia, bound together by vows of service to the royal family and kingdom.[/end]
The Order of the Candle is the knightly order charged with the protection of the royal family and kingdom of Sentinel.[/end]
The Knights of the Rose are consecrated as protectors and warriors for the royal family and kingdom of Wayrest.[/end]
The Knights of the Flame have been affiliated with the royal Flyte family for centuries, and now they have become the protectors of the land of Anticlere.[/end]
The Host of the Horn is composed of the finest knights of Lainlyn, bound by oaths to protect and serve the Barony of Lainlyn and its ruling family.[/end]
The Knights of the Owl are the traditional guard and militia of Glenpoint, the finest in the region.[/end]
The Order of the Raven has been the consecrated protector of the Barony of Dwynnen for hundreds of years.[/end]
The Knights of the Wheel protect and serve the people and ruling family of Abibon-Gora. They are among the finest knights in Hammerfell.[/end]
The Order of the Scarab is composed of knights charged by holy oaths with the protection of the royal family and land of Totambu.[/end]
The Knights of the Hawk are chosen from the finest, noblest warriors in Antiphyllos, to protect and fight for the royal family and people of the land.[/end]
Any temple dedicated to the Goddess of Beauty is called a House of Dibella. The priests and priestesses within are epicureans and orgiasts who aspire for beauty of the form and mind.[/end]

Where jealousy walks, there sorrow be[/record]
I hold the locket, and thou hast the key[/record]
On thy bonny hair, I spy a flea[/record]
When thou seest love, do not flee[/record]
My goddess, O Mara, I do plea[/record]
What does it mean to be truly free?[/record]
Add one to us, love, and make three[/record]
Birds chatter love songs in their tree[/record]
But you, my love, are far across the sea[/record]
You give yourself and I give myself to thee[/record]
So it was stated by Mara's decree[/record]
No fool doth love ever guarantee[/record]
What a sight my eyes do see![/record]
You drowned within the raging sea[/record]
I brought your soul inside of me[/end]

I got me flowers to strew thy way[/record]
Thy hair night-black, thy eyes bright as day[/record]
With a nonny, nonny, nonny, nonny, hey![/record]
On a bough of flowers, my body lay[/record]
Like children, in gold fields we play[/record]
What price for love we fools do pay![/record]
Like clouds fore the storm, I turn gray[/record]
My darling, beside me please stay![/record]
My love like a strong branch ne'er will sway[/record]
Flowers you pluck to make your bouquet[/record]
The dancers begin their sad ballet[/record]
Now let us sport while we may[/record]
My love, thou art so far far away[/record]
A thousand wasted hours every day[/record]
Would thou simply throw me away?[/end]

Sweet day, so cool, so calm and bright[/record]
Shelter yourself from jealousy's bite[/record]
Peace, my love, I weary of the fight[/record]
Let us hold our love up to the light[/record]
Harvests come of plenty and blight[/record]
Pity not me my sorrowful plight![/record]
Struggle we do with all our might[/record]
She was his lady and he her knight[/record]
Walketh thou in beauty like the night[/record]
Thou paineth me of jealous spite[/record]
I curse my eyes for their sight[/record]
I spy in the field a horse so white[/record]
Come my love, come at twilight[/record]
Of thee, dear, I do delight[/record]
I am in the room without a light[/record]
I would give anything to hold you tight[/record]
I would love to take you home tonight[/record]
Take me in your arms this very night[/end]

Thus sang the uncouth swain[/record]
Thy love is like a sweet, sweet bane[/record]
If this be love, I cannot feign[/record]
Bring me the knife that I be slain[/record]
Why must love bring so much pain?[/record]
In my heart a tyrant doth reign[/record]
Thou left me standing in the rain[/record]
How, my love, can thou be vain?[/record]
The fickle moon doth wax and wane[/record]
My heart is broke again in twain[/record]
Forces occult, daedric, arcane[/record]
With words, I to you enchain[/record]
You look to me with true disdain[/record]
How can I pray hope regain?[/record]
Perhaps, my love, I should explain[/record]
How do lovers from love abstain?[/record]
Thou came to me like a hurricane[/record]
I can see through thy legerdemain[/record]
I am plagued with thoughts inane[/record]
I only hope I might entertain[/record]
'Twere lovers and madmen e'er sane?[/end]

이미 충돌하는[/center]이점 혹은 단점을[/center]선택한 상태입니다.[/center][/end]
변화마법은 변화마법 학파를 의미하며,[/center]여섯개의 큰 학파들 중 하나입니다.[/center]이 마법 학파는 그 요점을 한 물체의[/center]그 근본적인 구조와 구성을 매지카로[/center]변화 시키는데 두고 있습니다. 저속하강,[/center]방어막 마법이 대표적인 변화마법 입니다.[/center][/end]
궁술은 활과 화살을 사용해서 목표에[/center]피해를 주는 능력에 관한 기술 입니다.[/center][/center][/end]
도끼술은 전쟁도끼 혹은 전투도끼를[/center]목표에 사용할때 자동으로 사용되는 기술 입니다.[/center][/end]
배후공격은 목표의 후방에서 공격시[/center]사용되는 기술입니다.[/center]이 기술에 능숙하면 적의 후방을 공격시[/center]적중 확률이 올라갑니다.[/center]추가로 배후공격이 제대로 들어갔을때[/center]더 많은 피해를 줄 수 있습니다.[/center][/end]
둔기 무기는 목표를 무겁고, 날이 없는[/center]메이스나 스태프로 공격시 사용되는 기술입니다.[/center]능숙한 둔기 무기 전문가는 공격시[/center]더 높은 명중률과 피해를 줄 수 있습니다.[/center][/center][/end]
센타우리어는 반은 인간이고 반은 말인 센타우르와[/center]대화를 시도할때 사용되는 언어 기술 입니다.[/center][/end]
등반은 벽이나 절벽 경사면을 기어오를때[/center]사용되는 기술입니다.[/center]지면에 닿기 전까지 계속 사용됩니다.[/center][/center][/end]
치명 공격은 성공적으로 목표를 공격[/center]할때 마다 사용되는 기술입니다.[/center]대상에 치명 공격을 성공하면 압도적이며,[/center]치명적인 추가 피해를 줍니다.[/center][/center][/end]
데이드릭어는 파이어 데이드라, 데이드라 로드[/center]같은 데이드라와 대화할때 사용되는 기술입니다.[/center][/end]
파괴마법은 마법 분야의 6개 정규 분야 중[/center]하나인 파괴 학파를 말합니다.[/center]파괴 마법은 적에게 피해를 주는 것이[/center]주 목적이며, 파이어볼, 독성 구름 같은[/center]주문이 있습니다.[/end]
Disguise is a skill automatically checked[/center]whenever one attempts either to infiltrate a[/center]hostile environment or to secrete items away[/center]from prying eyes.[/center][/end]
회피는 적의 무기 혹은 주문으로[/center]공격 받을 때 사용되는 기술 입니다.[/center][/end]

Dragon is a language skill checked[/center]
whenever one attempts to speak with[/center]
a dragon.[/center]
[/record]

Elvish is a language skill checked[/center]
whenever one attempts to speak with[/center]
a Wild Elf.[/center]
[/end]

Etiquette is a skill checked whenever[/center]
one attempts to be polite, deferential,[/center]
and charming in conversation.[/center]
[/end]

Faerie is a language skill checked[/center]
whenever one attempts to speak with[/center]
a Faerie.[/center]
[/end]
자이언트어는 자이언트와 대화를[/center]시도할때 사용되는 언어 기술 입니다.[/center][/end]
맨손격투는 주먹 혹은 발차기를[/center]다루는 기술 입니다.[/center][/end]

Harpy is a language skill checked[/center]
whenever one attempts to speak with[/center]
a Harpy.[/center]
[/end]

Illusion refers to the School of Illusion,[/center]
one of the six avenues of magical study.[/center]
Illusion spells are capable of camouflaging,[/center]
illuminating, or obscuring objects, as the[/center]
spells Invisibility and Light demonstrate.[/center]
[/end]

Impish is a language skill checked[/center]
whenever one attempts to speak with[/center]
an Imp.[/center]
[/end]

Jumping is a skill checked to determine[/center]
the height and distance one is capable[/center]
of leaping.[/center]
[/end]

Lockpicking is a skill automatically[/center]
checked whenever one attempts to pick the[/center]
lock on a door or a chest.[/center]
[/end]

Long Blade is a skill checked whenever[/center]
one attempts to strike a target with a[/center]
long-bladed, slashing weapon such as a[/center]
claymore or a katana.[/center]
[/end]

Medical skill is automatically checked[/center]
whenever one rests, allowing one to[/center]
diagnose minor injuries and illnesses.[/center]
[/end]

Mercantile is a skill checked whenever[/center]
one enters into negotiations with a[/center]
merchant, attempting to buy or sell[/center]
an item at the best possible price.[/center]
[/end]

Mysticism refers to the School of[/center]
Mysticism, one of the six avenues of[/center]
magical study. Mysticism is the most[/center]
arcane school, and the spells created[/center]
by its application are as varied as[/center]
Far Silence and Soul Trap.[/center]
[/end]

Nymph is a language skill checked[/center]
whenever one attempts to speak with[/center]
a Nymph.[/center]
[/end]

Pickpocketing is a skill automatically[/center]
checked whenever one attempts to steal[/center]
an item off a person or shelf without[/center]
being detected.[/center]
[/end]

Restoration refers to the School of[/center]
Restoration, one of the six avenues[/center]
of magical study. Any healing spell[/center]
such as Cure Poison and Troll's[/center]
Blood hails from Restoration.[/center]
[/end]

Running is a skill automatically[/center]
checked whenever one begins to[/center]
run, to check the possible speed.[/center]
[/end]

Short Blade is a skill checked whenever[/center]
one attempts to strike a target with[/center]
a short-bladed stabbing weapon such as[/center]
a dagger or a tanto, to determine the[/center]
aim and damage possible in a strike.[/center]
[/end]

Spriggan is a language skill checked[/center]
whenever one attempts to speak with[/center]
a Spriggan.[/center]
[/end]

Stealth is a skill which allows one[/center]
to avoid the attention of a hostile[/center]
creature. It is automatically checked[/center]
at every encounter.[/center]
[/end]

Streetwise is a skill checked[/center]
whenever one attempts to be blunt,[/center]
colloquial, or otherwise informal[/center]
in conversation.[/center]
[/end]

Swimming is a skill automatically[/center]
checked whenever one encounters[/center]
water to see how fast one can swim,[/center]
how fatigued one gets while swimming,[/center]
and how long one can stay underwater.[/center]
[/end]

Thaumaturgy refers to the School of[/center]
Thaumaturgy, one of the six avenues[/center]
of magical study. A Thaumaturgical[/center]
spell does not change the appearance[/center]
or structure of a force or object,[/center]
but can manipulate laws temporarily,[/center]
as evident in such spells as[/center]
Levitate and Water Walking.[/center]
[/end]

You might be interested to know that %fx1 has just allied with %fx2.[/record]
I just found out that %fx1 cut a deal with %fx2. Interesting, huh?[/record]
Don't spread this around, but %fx1 and %fx2 are working together.[/end]

Everybody knows that %fx2 had a grudge against %fx1, but now they're really going at it.[/record]
%fx1 got the short end of the stick in some deal. Now they're out to get %fx2[/record]
%fx1 and %fx2 hate each other. I wouldn't be surprised if somebody didn't end up dead because of it.[/end]

%fl1 insulted %fl2 in a missive. Now %fx2 is out to get %fx1.[/record]
%fx1 and %fx2 were close allies until that incident at the palace.[/record]
Until recently %fx1 and %fx2 worked together. They just recently severed their alliance.[/end]

I heard that %fx1 and %fx2 have patched up their differences.[/record]
%fx1 paid a large peace fee to %fx2. Hopefully that will stop their quarrelling.[/record]
I never understood why %fx1 and %fx2 were feuding. Well at least that's over now.[/end]

The people of %reg are very glad to have %fx2 as a new ally.[/record]
I don't like %fx2, but it's better to have them as an ally of %reg than an enemy.[/record]
Did you hear? %reg just signed an agreement with %fx2.[/end]

I understand that %fx2 is really hacked off with %reg.[/record]
I'm sure you heard that %reg is no longer on good terms with %fx2.[/record]
%fx2 are now sworn enemies of %reg. Don't have any dealings with them.[/end]

%ol1 %olf. %fx1 has a new %lt1.[/record]
I really liked %ol1. But now %fl1 is in charge of %fx1.[/record]
It's all over town. %ol1 %olf. Can believe that %fl1 is filling those boots?[/end]

It's just dreadful. %fx1 and %fx2 are at war![/record]
I knew there were tensions between %fx1 and %fx2, but I never thought they would declare war.[/record]
%fx1 is at war with %fx2! Isn't that great![/end]

%fx1 almost wiped out the %fx2 army. %fx1 has won the war![/record]
%fx2 lost. %fx2 has demanded unconditional surrender. The war is over.[/record]
The %fx1 army swept into the capital. %fx2 has been defeated.[/end]

%fx1 and %fx2 have signed a peace treaty. The war was ruining both their economies.[/record]
%fx1 was winning the war, but ran out of money. They were forced to sign an armistice with %fx2.[/record]
The war is over! The war is over! %fx1 and %fx2 stopped fighting. I haven't heard why.[/end]

Lock your doors at night. Nobody is safe anymore from the criminals. They just take anything they want.[/record]
They killed %n in broad daylight. The guards didn't even do anything. What is this place coming to.[/end]

We're all preparing for %hol. It's coming up soon.[/record]
Are you ready for %hol? Don't wait too long.[/record]
%hol is almost here. I wouldn't wait to the last minute to get ready.[/end]

Did you hear that the Thieves Guild master has been arrested? I hope they hang him.[/record]
The Thieves Guild master is in jail. I'm sure he'll have escaped by tomorrow.[/record]
No prison can hold the Thieves Guild master for long. That's why his trial will be held soon.[/end]

Can you believe they set the Thieves Guild master free? That wily old fox.[/record]
He escaped! The Thieves Guild master broke out of prison.[/record]
The Thieves Guild master escaped. I knew that tin jail couldn't hold him.[/end]

Beheaded. That's what happened to the Thieves Guild master. Good riddance.[/record]
They executed the Thieves Guild master. I hear he will lie in an unmarked grave.[/record]
They didn't take long in executing the poor bastard. Who? The Thieves Guild master of course.[/end]

I hear there is a mad wizard stirring up trouble.[/record]
Some insane sorcerer turned the palace pink. It took two weeks to get it cleaned.[/record]
There's a crackpot wizard out there. If we don't follow orders, we'll all be turnips.[/end]

That old mage was crazy. It's a good thing they slew him.[/record]
She was a nutcase. It's too dangerous to let mad wizards run loose, so they killed her.[/record]
The whole town is rejoicing. The crazy sorcerer is dead![/end]

Everything in this place is too expensive. I can hardly afford to buy bread any more.[/record]
The merchants are all pigs. They set their prices as high as they want and nobody dares do anything.[/record]
Money doesn't grow on trees. I am having to sell my furniture to afford food! These prices are outrageous.[/end]

There's a trade war going on. Buy everything you can while it's cheap.[/record]
It all started when crazy %n cut all his prices in half. Now all the merchants have lowered their prices to compete.[/record]
I'm on my way to buy new clothes. Price on everything are so low, I want to buy now before they go up again.[/end]

I hear there are witches in %reg. Somewhere out in the hills or deep in the forest.[/record]
The witches are causing trouble again. Those bitches in the hills better watch out, or there'll be burnings soon.[/record]
What the Mages Guild is saying about the witches isn't true. The old hags in the forest are mostly harmless.[/record]
I hear the witches can summon Daedra Lords. %reg would be better off without the hags.[/end]

%n died last night. The body was completely drained of blood![/record]
The found poor %n, with two puncture wounds in the neck. Not a drop of blood was left in the body.[/record]
The vampires are not just mindless monsters. The clans meet in secret and plot to control all of mankind![/record]
The dirty blood suckers are running this place. Vampires, of course. I mean the vampire clans.[/end]

%n, a mage's apprentice, was telling me that there are powerful beings called Daedras living in a place called Oblivion. They can grant a man powerful magical items called artifacts. I'm sure it's just a story.[/record]
Be good to your fellow man, or the Daedra's will take you away to Oblivion.[/record]
Daedras can actually be summoned. I hear the witches and Mages Guild do it all the time.[/record]
Only the temples can summon Daedras safely. The priests can force them to reveal the secret location of powerful artifacts.[/end]

There are rumors that someone has a clue to the whereabouts of Auriel's Shield. Supposedly the shield can make you invulnerable to fire and magic.[/record]
Some drunken knight was claiming to have lost the Warlock's Ring. Of course, if he really did have that artifact, he would be a king and not a drunk.[/record]
I heard an archer say that Auriel's Bow was found and then lost again. In the stories, a single arrow shot from the bow could kill any creature.[/record]
There's a story being whispered about a mad wizard that has the Necromancer's Ring. That artifact is just a myth.[/record]
My brother knows someone whose sister slept with a man that saw Chrysamere, the sword of heroes.[/record]
Some mad hermit tried to convince me that the Lord's Mail was real and not just a legend. I had to kill him to protect myself.[/record]
The Mages Guild just executed old %n for claiming to have discovered the long lost location of the Staff of Magnus. Poor deluded mage.[/record]
They say that the Daedra Lords claimed most of the ancient artifacts. They only give them to loyal servants.[/record]
I've heard it said that the witches can help a person find one of the lost artifacts of ancient power.[/end]

You should know that the thieves have a secret guild, led by a mysterious master.[/record]
The Thieves Guild is not just a legend it's real. I cannot tell you how I know, or they will kill me.[/record]
Although most folk deny it, all thieves in %reg belong to a secret Thieves Guild. Any thief refusing to join ends up dead.[/end]

If you really want revenge, contact the Dark Brotherhood. They are professional assassins.[/record]
There is such a thing as an assassins guild, which calls itself the Dark Brotherhood. They recruit the most cold blooded killers they can find.[/record]
The Dark Brotherhood is quite powerful in %reg. This assassins guild punishes outsiders that kill for money.[/end]

%lt1 is having an affair.[/record]
They say we will have new cobblestone streets before the year is out.[/record]
%n says that the bands on the fuzzy caterpillars predict a bad winter.[/record]
There is supposed to be a new tax announced soon.[/record]
Don't go out at night. %n saw ghouls lurking in the alleys.[/record]
Representatives of the Empire are expected in %reg soon.[/record]
The weakest link in the Imperial chain is the province of Sumurset Isle. Then %reg.[/end]

Hmmm. Can't think of any.[/record]
None that I know of.[/record]
I try not to spread rumors.[/record]
Since I have nothing nice to say ...[/end]

%nrn has declared that all witches[/center]
[/left]
are to be burnt at the stake.[/center]
[/record]
Witchcraft is punishable by[/center]
burning at the stake. -- %nrn[/center]
[/record]
Any witch shall be burnt alive while[/center]
bound to a stake, by the order of %nrn.[/center]
[/end]

%nrn has declared that %ptm[/center]
is guilty of treason and heresy.[/center]
[/record]
Any member of %ptm are to[/center]
be jailed immediately. -- %nrn[/center]
[/record]
%ptm is not recognized by %reg or %nrn.[/center]
All its lands and properties[/center]
are subject to confiscation.[/center]
[/end]

Due to the famine in %reg, all[/center]
merchants importing food must[/center]
report to the gate captain.[/center]
[/record]
One part in ten of all food[/center]
entering this town must be turned[/center]
over to %t, so that %g3 grace does[/center]
not suffer from the famine.[/center]
[/record]
%reg is beset by famine. Wasting[/center]
food is punishable by flogging. -- %nrn[/end]

All plague victims must be left[/center]
in the street to be gathered and[/center]
burned. -- %nrn[/record]
Bewarned all visitors. Our fair[/center]
town is beset by the plague.[/center]
[/record]
By order of %nrn, no person showing sign[/center]
of plague may enter or leave this town.[/center]
[/end]

A state of war exists between %fx1[/center]
and %fx2. Any foreign citizen of the enemy[/center]
found within this place will be hanged.[/center]
-- %nrn[/center]
[/record]
%fx1 is at war with %fx2.[/center]
All visitors may be subject to search.[/center]
[/record]
By the order of %nrn, for the duration[/center]
of the war between %fx1 and %fx2,[/center]
military rule is in effect.[/center]
[/end]

The noble ruler, %ol1 %olf.[/center]
Long live %fl1, newly made %lt1 of %reg.[/center]
[/record]
%fl1 has ascended to the throne and [/center]
is the new %lt1. Long may %fl1 rule over %reg.[/center]
[/record]
%fl1 is the new %lt1 of %reg.[/center]
[/end]

%fx2 is formally allied to %fx1.[/center]
[/record]
%fx1 and %fx2 have signed an agreement.[/center]
[/record]
%fx1 has formal relations with %fx2.[/center]
[/end]

Any person from %fx2 will be persecuted[/center]
to the full extent of the law. -- %nrn[/center]
[/record]
Persons of %fx2 are to be[/center]
detained upon sight. -- %nrn[/center]
[/record]
For crimes against %reg, %fx2[/center]
is the sworn enemy of %nrn.[/center]
[/end]

By order of %nrn, all taxes[/center]
must be paid by the end of the month.[/center]
[/record]
All weapons must be peace bonded.[/record]
Magic is strictly prohibited in town.[/center]
[/record]
All merchants transporting ale[/center]
must report to the Captain's tower.[/center]
[/record]
%n is an enemy of %reg.[/center]
Sightings of this criminal are[/center]
to be reported to the watch.[/center]
[/end]

노드는 스카이림 지역의 원주민입니다.[/center]키가 크고 밝은색 피부를 가졌으며, 강하고,끈질기며, 강인합니다.[/center]스카이림의 기후 때문에 노드는 극한의 추위에도 견뎌내며,[/center]냉기 기반의 마법 공격에도 적은 피해를 받습니다.[/center]노드는 역사적으로 전사로서의 무예에 두각을 나타냈습니다.[/center]캐릭터를 노드로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]

카짓은 엘스웨어 지역의 원주민입니다.[/center]카짓은 황갈색의 털을 가졌고, 극히 강인하며, 지능이 높고, 민첩합니다.[/center]많은 카짓이 그들의 전설적인 고양이과 친척이며[/center]대사막에서 사냥을 한다는 사냥 고양이처럼 칠하고 다닙니다.[/center]카짓은 뛰어난 등반 능력을 가지고 있으며, 도둑으로서의 능력에 적합합니다.[/center]캐릭터를 카짓으로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]

레드가드는 해머펠 지역의 원주민입니다.[/center]레드가드는 어두운 피부를 가졌고, 극히 강인하며, 몸놀림이 빠릅니다.[/center]전설에 따르면 레드가드는 다른 어떤 종족들 보다 무기를 잘 다루는 능력이[/center]선천적으로 뛰어나다고 합니다.[/center]레드가드는 대게 매우 뛰어난 전사들 입니다.[/center]캐릭터를 레드가드로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]

브레튼은 하이락 지역의 원주민입니다.[/center]키가 크고, 밝은색 피부를 가졌으며, 매우 지능이 높고, 의지력이 강합니다.[/center]브레튼은 선천적인 마법적 연관성을 가졌습니다.[/center]브레튼은 다른 어떤 종족 보다 적대적인 효과의 마법에 대한 저항력이 높으며,[/center]마법을 다루는 기술 또한 매우 뛰어납니다.[/center]캐릭터를 브레튼으로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]

아르고니안은 블랙 마쉬 지역의 원주민입니다.[/center]고도로 진화한 파충류 종족으로 높은 지능, 민첩성, 속도를 지녔습니다.[/center]종족 특징으로 수영해도 잘 지치지 않으며, 많은 아르고니안이[/center]도둑 기술과 주문 구사에 두각을 보이고, 전사로서도 잘 알려졌습니다.[/center]캐릭터를 아르고니안으로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]

우드엘프는 바인우드 지역의 원주민입니다.[/center]키가 크고 밝은색 피부를 가졌으며, 극히 민첩하고 빠르기로 매우 유명합니다.[/center]우드 엘프는 활과 화살을 다루는데 선천적인 재능이 있습니다.[/center]거의 모든 직종에 재능이 있지만 매우 뛰어난 궁술이 특출납니다.[/center]캐릭터를 우드엘프로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]

하이엘프는 서머셋 지역의 원주민입니다.[/center]키가 크고 금빛 피부를 가졌으며, 극히 뛰어난 지능, 민첩성, 의지력으로 유명합니다.[/center]서머셋 섬의 마법적인 특징 덕분에 하이엘프는 주문 사용 능력을 타고나며,[/center]몸을 마비시키는 독과 마법에 대한 면역 능력을 선천적으로 가지고 있습니다.[/center]캐릭터를 하이엘프로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]
다크엘프는 모로윈드 지역의 원주민입니다.[/center]키가 크고 어두운 피부를 가졌으며, 극히 강하고, 뛰어난 지능, 속도로 유명합니다.[/center]모든 분야에서 매우 뛰어난 능력을 발휘할 수 있으며,[/center]전사와 마법사로 잘 알려져 있습니다.[/center]캐릭터를 다크엘프로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]

The Mages Guild is an inter-provincial organization[/center] under a council of five archmagisters, dedicated to[/center] the study and application of magicka. Our students[/center] have concocted a number of the more popular potions[/center] and magical items which we offer at reasonable[/center] prices. We also have a variety of standard spells[/center] and potion ingredients, also for sale. In addition,[/center] our study is available for all serious students of[/center] magicka wishing to create their own spells.[/center] [/center] Of course, the Mages Guild is no mere curiosity[/center] shop. Persons judged worthy to join the Mages Guild[/center] are given access to libraries and laboratories of[/center] every description. Not all at once, of course, but[/center] gradually. One has to be careful about whom one[/center] trusts with great power.[/center] [/center] After all, the Mages Guild is all about[/center] responsibility.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

The Akatosh Chantry is devoted to the worship[/center] of Akatosh, the Great Dragon. Akatosh is the most[/center] constant of gods, for his sphere is time itself.[/center] [/center] Perhaps, if you are in need of a blessing of time[/center] and are willing to make an appreciable donation,[/center] Akatosh might smile upon you and grant you time:[/center] time to heal your injuries, perhaps, or time to[/center] shorten your voyages.[/center] [/center] Our priests and priestess here have a variety of[/center] other skills and services available for members[/center] of the Akatosh Chantry. Naturally, one has to be[/center] judged worthy before one is sheltered under the[/center] Great Wings of Akatosh.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

We are the Order of Arkay, the God of Birth and[/center] Death. Arkay is the great spirit who brings every[/center] man and woman, Human, Elf, Khajiit, and Argonian[/center] into this world, and when the time is true, ends[/center] their circle. Arkay is fertility and blight, joy[/center] and sorrow. At the Order, we celebrate the Blessed[/center] Neutrality that Arkay stands for.[/center] [/center] While we do not offer strangers blessings, for to[/center] give favor or curse would be to upset the eternal[/center] balance, the Order offers much to its members.[/center] Our libraries and sages are some of the finest in[/center] Tamriel. Of course, few are worthy to be initiated[/center] into the mysteries of Birth and Death.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

At the House of Dibella, we seek truth through[/center] beauty and the worship of the embodiment of beauty,[/center] the Goddess Dibella.[/center] [/center] Dibella smiles on those who give generously to our[/center] House. She grants charm and grace to donors. In[/center] proportion to their generosity, of course.[/center] [/center] We are always interested in new initiates to the[/center] House of Dibella, though only those possessing[/center] skills in the promotion of harmony. To be honest,[/center] very few qualify.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

Temples devoted to the Mother Goddess of Tamriel[/center] are called Benevolences, for we are devoted to the[/center] charge of uniting all creatures as brethren,[/center] childer of Mara. We are intolerant only of those[/center] who show intolerance; we hate only those who hate.[/center] [/center] Mara is our Mother Goddess, and thus she blesses[/center] all with the gift of love. Particularly, she favors[/center] those who help her followers in Tamriel. For a[/center] reasonable donation to our Benevolence, you will[/center] be blessed and be forever beloved by he or she who[/center] loves you best.[/center] [/center] Those who devote themselves further to the Mother[/center] Goddess are even more blessed. Our priests and[/center] priestesses study the greatness of Mara's Tamriel[/center] and have learned much. So there is much to share[/center] with our initiates who are judged to be true[/center] to Mara's calling.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

The School of Julianos is no mere temple, dedicated[/center] to mindless obeisance to a distant and hazy God[/center] figure. Julianos is a God, to be sure, but foremost[/center] he is a symbol of learning, logic, philosophy, and[/center] wisdom. We espouse no moral philosophy other than[/center] the goodness of knowledge. As the great Psijic[/center] once said, the power of ignorance can truly shatter[/center] mithril like glass. That is our enemy.[/center] [/center] Scholarship is a long and difficult journey, and[/center] Julianos does not tolerate those who wish to shorten[/center] it. However, He does bless those who generously[/center] donate to His School with a temporary increase in[/center] their magical skills.[/center] [/center] While we advocate literacy and education for all[/center] Tamrielans, our policy for those who wish to join[/center] the School itself is very stringent. We have little[/center] time to waste training the slow and the lazy.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

Our Lady is the Goddess Kynareth whose sphere is[/center] the Heavens itself. She is sometimes called the[/center] Goddess of Air, the Pure One. It was She who gave[/center] the Lords Mail to the Warrior Lord Morihaus to[/center] combat the unclean Daedric spirits.[/center] [/center] By the glory of our Lady, we have become the[/center] greatest physicians in Tamriel -- our ability[/center] to cure magical and mundane diseases is truly[/center] unrivalled. Other temples cure only their own[/center] priests, but we are philanthropists.[/center] [/center] Of course, the Goddess shows special favor on Her[/center] own. We do take in new initiates, provided they[/center] show devotion to the Goddess and have the skill[/center] to make their devotion worthwhile.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

Our God is the God of Mercy, Stendarr. Some mock[/center] our compassion, calling us sentimental fools and[/center] tenderhearts. But the truth is that everyone, no[/center] matter their strength, crawls to us when Sai, the[/center] God of Luck deserts them as he is prone to do.[/center] [/center] Our gift to the traveller is a simple one -- we[/center] heal those who are in pain. For more complicated[/center] ailments, diseases and poisonings, we direct you[/center] to the Temple of Kynareth. With due respect, for[/center] they are the finest apothecaries and we, the[/center] finest chirurgeons.[/center] [/center] If one possesses the desire and aptitude, one may[/center] join the Temple. Though we desire to help all[/center] Tamrielans, we only possess the means to train[/center] and assist a small handful. Sometimes, it is best[/center] to begin one's compassion with oneself.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

We are a temple devoted to Zenithar, the God of[/center] Commerce and Patron of Merchants and Mercenaries.[/center] Long ago, in our movement's birth, our forefathers[/center] made us a temple like no other: one meant to be[/center] adaptable, but resilient to the storm of time. We[/center] are thus called Resolutions, a far more[/center] descriptive term than temples.[/center] [/center] The Resolution of Zenithar favors those who favor[/center] us -- we do not choose to hide behind words like[/center] donations, gifts, indulgences. In proportion to[/center] your payment to the Resolution, your skill in[/center] haggling with other merchants will increase, but[/center] temporarily. If you wish to increase your skill[/center] permanently, you may wish to join the Resolution[/center] and meet with our trainers.[/center] [/center] The invitation to join the Resolution of Zenithar[/center] is not open. Only those already possessing a[/center] few minimum skills will even be considered. It[/center] does not reward us to waste our time with[/center] neophytes. If nothing else, we are professionals.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

We of the Order of the Lamp are the protectors of[/center] the Mages Guild. We follow the Palantinus, under[/center] direct orders from the Archmagister.[/center] [/center] We are given appropriate rights to certain services[/center] at the Mages Guild. One's rank within the Order[/center] approximates ones rank within the Guild, in terms[/center] of rights and privileges.[/center] [/center] The Order is only open to those who have already[/center] demonstrated fighting skills and are in good[/center] standing with the Mages Guild.[/center] [/end]

The Knights of the Dragon have the official duty[/center] of protecting the city and royal family of[/center] Daggerfall. We are led by the honorable Lord[/center] Bridwell, the greatest hero of the War of[/center] Betony.[/center] [/center] To be considered for admission into our fighting[/center] order, one must demonstrate exceptional combat[/center] skills and a reputation for honor and loyalty to[/center] Daggerfall. In return, our knights are[/center] treated with unparalleled respect in Daggerfall.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

The Order of the Candle have replaced the defunct[/center] Knights of the Moon as the official protectors and[/center] warriors of the kingdom of Sentinel. The lords[/center] Vhosek of the Moon and K'avar are our commanders[/center] and we follow their order implicitly.[/center] [/center] In Sentinel, no order, guild, or organization is[/center] treated with more respect than we. Only men and[/center] women of exceptional fighting skills and[/center] demonstrated loyalty to the royal family of[/center] Sentinel will be considered for[/center] admission.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

We of the Knights of the Rose have the honor of[/center] being the guard and strong arm of his majesty,[/center] King Eadwyre of Wayrest. The greatest knights[/center] in his court are members of our order and we[/center] have demonstrated our worth in internal and[/center] interprovincial struggles throughout the Bay[/center] and Tamriel.[/center] [/center] For those few whose combat abilities and true[/center] loyalty to the King are judged acceptable, we[/center] offer membership in the most respected order[/center] in Wayrest.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

The Knights of the Flame are the noble warriors[/center] of the Lorddom of Anticlere. Our allegiance is[/center] unswerving to Lord and Lady Flyte, who rescued[/center] us from the chaos following the War of Betony.[/center] [/center] Only those known for their loyalty to Anticlere[/center] and our blessed patrons are judged worthy to[/center] join our order. In return for their allegiance,[/center] our knights are treated as veritable gods in[/center] Anticlere.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

The Host of the Horn have the honor of serving[/center] his most terrible Grace, the Baron Shrike. Our[/center] duties consist of all important activities from[/center] straight warfare to espionage and tax collection.[/center] [/center] It may be worth dispelling this confusion: the[/center] Baron's weak brother Lord Kain has his own order[/center] devoted to the illegal acquisition of the throne[/center] of Lainlyn, and he idiotically calls his[/center] piteous group, the Host of the True Horn.[/center] [/center] If one has demonstrated loyalty to Baron Shrike[/center] and prowess in battle, one may be considered for[/center] admission in our proud Host. We have not earned[/center] the fear and respect of all in Lainlyn by[/center] wasting time with the hopeless.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

We of the Knights of the Owl are responsible[/center] for protecting and fighting for the royal family[/center] of Glenpoint. Only those of the most refined[/center] fighting skills and dedicated to the welfare[/center] of Glenpoint are considered for inclusion in[/center] our knightly order.[/center] [/center] Our knights are the royal escorts of the[/center] Baron and treated with unparalleled respect[/center] in all of Glenpoint.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

In all modesty, the Order of the Raven is a[/center] legendary fighting order. We have the honor of[/center] having led the battle against the Camoran[/center] Usurper and freed half of Tamriel from his tyranny.[/center] [/center] We remain the vanguards of the Barony of Dwynnen,[/center] protecting the entire region. Given our[/center] reputation, we cannot admit any but the greatest[/center] warriors, the most loyal servants of the Baron,[/center] into our order.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

The Knights of the Wheel represent the royal[/center] family and the city of Abibon-Gora in all[/center] military situations.[/center] [/center] We are not currently soliciting new recruits[/center] into our order. A suitably talented warrior[/center] known for his or her loyalty to Abibon-Gora[/center] might, however, still merit consideration.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

We of the Order of the Scarab have the[/center] honor of being the official guard for the[/center] royal family of Totambu. Our duties are many,[/center] our favor is great. Only the most refined[/center] and loyal warriors are considered for[/center] initiation. It is a very great honor indeed.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

The Knights of the Hawk act as the noble[/center] warriors and protectors of the town and[/center] royal family of Antiphyllos. Many have trained[/center] since childhood to join our knightly order,[/center] for the honor and prestige.[/center] [/center] Are you perhaps interested in joining?[/center] [/end]

The Knights of the Circle are the military[/center] arm of the Order of Arkay. It is our solemn[/center] duty to protect the Order and to fight[/center] their battles. Our devotion to the God[/center] Arkay and the Order are complete.[/center] [/center] Only those of exceptional fighting prowess[/center] and unswerving loyalty to the Order and[/center] the God Arkay are considered for inclusion[/center] in the Knights of the Circle.[/center] [/end]

We of the Knights of Iron are in charge of[/center] the military excursions of the Resolution[/center] of Zenithar. Zenithar is not merely the[/center] God of Merchants and Commerce, He is also[/center] a warrior god. We represent that side of[/center] Him.[/center] [/center] Obviously, it does not behoove us to take[/center] any new initiates who are less than[/center] excellent fighters and completely[/center] devoted to our cause.[/center] [/end]

Mara represents love and peace. She and Her[/center] Benevolence recognize that, as hypocritical[/center] as it sounds, military strength is often[/center] needed to beget this peace. The Maran[/center] Knights represent this military strength.[/center] [/center] We are admittedly a controversial knightly[/center] order. Some misguided clerics within the[/center] Temple would prefer that we disband, but[/center] they are in the minority, and all respect[/center] our skill and loyalty.[/center] [/end]

We are the military arm of the Akatosh[/center] Chantry, the Order of the Hour, charged[/center] with the protection of the Chantry. Our[/center] knights are devoted to the Great Dragon,[/center] and dedicated to the promise of stability[/center] and permanence He represents.[/center] [/center] Our duties are varied indeed, and our[/center] honors bountiful. An initiate in our Order[/center] have the same rights and honors of an[/center] initiate in the Chantry.[/center] [/end]

The Knights Mentor are brothers and sisters[/center] to the School of Julianos. While they do[/center] research and expand the libraries of the[/center] School, we protect them. And, in turn,[/center] they share their expanded knowledge with[/center] us. It is a perfect relationship and[/center] benefits us each equally.[/center] [/center] Naturally, only those of exceptional[/center] military skill and demonstrated loyalty[/center] to the School and God Julianos are[/center] considered for membership into the[/center] Knights Mentor.[/center] [/end]

The House of Dibella is the noblest[/center] institution in Tamriel, we of the Order[/center] of the Lily firmly are devoted to its[/center] cause. Its only fault is that the priests[/center] and priestesses within are often too[/center] consumed with the propagation of beauty[/center] to protect themselves adequately.[/center] [/center] That is the sacred cause of the Order[/center] of the Lily. We protect the House and[/center] receive the training and blessings of[/center] clerics of equal rank. I can think of[/center] no better reason to fight than the[/center] cause of beauty.[/center] [/end]

We, the Knights of Stendarr the Merciful[/center] call ourselves the Crusaders, for it is[/center] our sacred duty to protect the Temple[/center] and fights its battles. While we firmly[/center] espouse the Temple's philosophy of[/center] compassion and charity, we recognize[/center] that if the Temple is weak, it cannot[/center] realistically survive.[/center] [/center] Only those of great combat ability and[/center] proven devotion to the Temple and the[/center] God Stendarr are eligible for possible[/center] membership in the Crusaders.[/center] [/end]

We are the strong arm of the Goddess[/center] Kynareth, an off-shoot of her temple[/center] devoted to fighting her causes all over[/center] Tamriel. Members of the Kynaran Order[/center] are honored for our skill and loyalty[/center] by the Temple, and given full access[/center] to the blessings and services within.[/center] According to individual rank in the[/center] Order, of course.[/center] [/center] Possible candidates for inclusion in[/center] the Kynaran Order are chosen on the[/center] basis of their combat skills and their[/center] reputation with the Temple.[/center] [/end]
메이지는 마법 기술의 학습과 사용에 일생을 바치는 자들 입니다.[/center]숙련된 메이지는 상대하기 매우 위협적인 상대가 될 수 있습니다.[/center]메이지 주요 기술: 모든 마법 학파--[/center]신비마법, 변화마법, 역동마법, 환영마법, 파괴마법, 회복마법.[/center]캐릭터를 메이지로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]

소서러는 마법을 다루는데 아주 능숙합니다.[/center]사용하는 마법적 에너지를 스스로 만들지는 못하지만[/center]자신이 공격 받는 마법에서 에너지를 흡수하여 주문 영창에 사용합니다.[/center]소서러 주요 기술: 모든 마법 학파--[/center]신비마법, 변화마법, 역동마법, 파괴마법, 회복마법, 환영마법.[/center]캐릭터를 소서러로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]
힐러는 마법을 상처와 질병을 회복하는데 사용합니다.[/center]때문에 보통 방어적인 역활을 수행합니다.[/center]힐러 주요 기술:[/center]회복마법, 의료, 회피, 역동마법, 신비마법, 변화마법.[/center]캐릭터를 힐러로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]
나이트블레이드는 은신 능력을 보충하는데 마법을 사용합니다.[/center]마법을 쓸 줄 아는 도둑과 유사합니다.[/center]나이트블레이드 주요 기술:[/center]환영마법, 은신, 회피, 역동마법, 소검, 자물쇠.[/center]캐릭터를 나이트블레이드로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]
바드는 가장 다재다능한 직업으로, 여러 기술을 가졌습니다.[/center]무기, 마법, 도둑 관련 기술에 능숙합니다.[/center]바드 주요 기술:[/center]거리예절, 궁중예절, 자물쇠, 은신, 소검, 격투.[/center]캐릭터를 바드로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]
버글러는 자물쇠 기술에 뛰어납니다.[/center]가장 잘 경비된 귀족의 집에도 들키지 않고 숨어 들어 갈 수 있습니다.[/center]버글러 주요 기술:[/center]자물쇠, 은신, 등반, 거래, 회피, 소검.[/center]캐릭터를 버글러로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]
로그는 도둑으로서의 은신기술과 전사로서의 전투기술을[/center]같이 훈련한 직업입니다.[/center]로그 주요 기술:[/center]장검, 은신, 회피, 자물쇠, 배후공격, 거리예절.[/center]캐릭터를 로그로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]

Acrobats practice the thieving arts, and use their[/center] remarkable physical skills to aid them.[/center] They are very quick, agile, and nimble. The most[/center] important skills to an Acrobat are: Jumping, Dodging,[/center] Running, Climbing, Hand-to-Hand, and Stealth.[/center] Do you wish your character to be an Acrobat?[/center] [/end]

Thieves are well known for their adeptness in using[/center] stealth, speed, and cunning to steal for a[/center] living. The six most important skills to[/center] a Thief are: Pickpocketing, Stealth, Short Blade,[/center] Backstabbing, Climbing, and Lockpicking.[/center] Do you wish your character to be a Thief?[/center] [/end]

Assassins are much feared and respected, for they[/center] use the night for concealment, and their cunning to[/center] strike deadly blows. Even secure locks cannot[/center] stay the Assassin's blade. The most important Assassin[/center] skills are: Critical Striking, Backstabbing, Stealth,[/center] Short Blade, Long Blade, and Blunt Weapon.[/center] Do you wish your character to be an Assassin?[/center] [/end]

Monks are specially trained in mental disciplines. This[/center] intense mental awareness includes the ability to[/center] turn the body into a lethal machine. The skills most[/center] important to a Monk are: Hand-to-Hand, Critical Striking,[/center] Dodging, Swimming, Medical, and Blunt Weapon.[/center] Do you wish your character to be a Monk?[/center] [/end]

Archers are warriors specially trained in the[/center] use of the bow. The most important skills to an Archer are:[/center] Archery, Hand-to-Hand, Dodging[/center] Axe, Blunt Weapon, and Critical Striking.[/center] Do you wish your character to be an Archer?[/center] [/end]

Rangers are at home in the wilderness, and are[/center] excellent hunters. They are very skilled at survival and[/center] tracking. The skills most important to a Ranger are:[/center] Long Blade, Axe, Climbing, Swimming,[/center] Archery, and Critical Striking.[/center] Do you wish your character to be a Ranger?[/center] [/end]

Barbarians are warriors that hail from the harsh[/center] lands that fringe more civilized areas. They make excellent[/center] fighters, well-suited to survival under the worst conditions.[/center] The skills Barbarians use most are:[/center] Blunt Weapon, Long Blade, Axe,[/center] Jumping, Running, and Swimming.[/center] Do you wish your character to be a Barbarian?[/center] [/end]
워리어는 전투와 전쟁 기술을 가장 강도 높게 훈련 받는 자들입니다.[/center]여러 무기의 사용에 익숙하며 갑옷으로 중무장 합니다.[/center]워리어 주요기술:[/center]도끼, 장검, 둔기 무기, 격투, 궁술, 소검[/center]캐릭터를 워리어로 하시겠습니까?[/center][/end]

Knights are trained as warriors. They hail from noble[/center] stock, and adhere to the code of chivalry.[/center] The most important skills to a Knight are:[/center] Long Blade, Etiquette, Blunt Weapon, Axe,[/center] Archery and Short Blade.[/center] Do you wish your character to be a Knight?[/center] [/end]

Help - General[/center]
[/record]
The ClassMaker allows you to create your own class.[/left]
Your new class must include:[/left]
1. A Name[/left]
2. 3 Primary Skills[/left]
3. 3 Major Skills[/left]
4. 6 Minor Skills[/left]
All other custom features are optional:[/left]
Adjusting some of these, such as adding special[/left]
advantages or disadvantages and higher or lower[/left]
health points per level, makes it more or less[/left]
difficult for the class to improve in skills and[/left]
thus rise in levels. The sliding "dagger" bar[/left]
marked "Skill Advancement" represents the[/left]
difficulty of a class learning new skills.[/left]
If you have any specific questions about a[/left]
function of the ClassMaker, click the appropriate[/left]
section under Help.[/end]

Help - Class Name[/center]
You may choose any name for your new character[/left]
class, so long as the name does not exceed 23[/left]
letters.[/end]

Help - Attributes[/center]
The base average of the Strength, Intelligence,[/left]
Willpower, Agility, Speed, Endurance, Personality[/left]
and Luck of the new class cannot exceed 50. If[/left]
you add five points to one of these attributes,[/left]
for example, you will have to subtract five from[/left]
another attribute.[/left]
The result is a list of the minimum attributes[/left]
for the new class. Your character will probably[/left]
have higher attribute scores than the minimum.[/left]
For a definition of each attribute, see the[/left]
Daggerfall manual.[/end]

Help - Skills[/center]
More than anything else, skills define a[/left]
class. Pick the most important three skills for[/left]
your class as Primary Skills, the next three most[/left]
important skills as Major Skills, and the next[/left]
six most important skills as Minor Skills.[/left]
The other skills will be available for your[/left]
character class, but they will be poorly mastered[/left]
if known at all when the game begins, and they[/left]
will be more difficult to raise.[/left]
It is important to pick skills most commonly[/left]
used and mastered by the new class for the[/left]
Primary and Major skills. These skills will[/left]
increase with constant use and, as the skills[/left]
increase, so will the character's level.[/end]

Help - Special Advantages[/center]
Special Advantages are optional finishing touches[/left]
such as Disease Resistance and Acute Hearing for[/left]
the customized class. Adding Special Advantages to a[/left]
class always increases the difficulty of raising[/left]
skill levels. Watch the dagger bar marked "Skill[/left]
Advancement", the higher the dagger, the tougher[/left]
it is for a member of a class to learn new[/left]
skill levels.[/left]
You can select a maximum of 7 Special Advantages.[/left]
Complete descriptions of each Special Advantage are[/left]
listed in the Daggerfall manual.[/left]
[/end]

Help - Special Disadvantages[/center]
Special Disadvantages are optional finishing[/left]
touches such as Forbidden Weaponry and Inability[/left]
to Regenerate Spell Points for the customized[/left]
class. The primary reason to add Special[/left]
Disadvantages is to lower the difficulty of[/left]
raising skill levels.[/left]
You can select a maximum of 7 Special Disadvantages.[/left]
Complete descriptions of each Special Disadvantage are[/left]
listed in the Daggerfall manual.[/left]
[/end]

Help - Reputations[/center]
Editing Reputations is a optional class creation[/left]
feature which allows you to help determine how[/left]
certain broad societal factions are inclined to[/left]
react to someone of your custom class.[/left]
These groups are by no means the only reputational[/left]
groups in the game: they are merely the broadest[/left]
and the most common.[/left]
The base average of all the reputational groups[/left]
together must always equal zero. Thus, if you add[/left]
five points to your reputation with one group, you[/left]
must subtract five from another.[/left]
For more on the importance of reputation, see the[/left]
Daggerfall manual.[/left]
[/record]

Help - Skill Advancement for Class[/center]
The position of the dagger in the Skill[/left]
Advancement table shows the approximate difficulty[/left]
of skill advancement for that particular class.[/left]
The higher the dagger rises, the more difficult it[/left]
is for a member of a class to rise in skill level.[/left]
Adding Special Advantages and extra health points[/left]
makes it more difficult for you to learn skills.[/left]
Adding disadvantages or lowering the health point[/left]
bonuses makes it easier or you to learn skills.[/left]
For reference, a true warrior learns skills at[/left]
the default, exact middle of the Skill Advancement[/left]
chart. Thieves have an easier time learning skills[/left]
and mages have a harder time.[/end]

City to join a troop of the Imperial Guards. The trip[/left]
to the capital drained your funds, so you immediately[/left]
took a job there, working evenings at maintaining order[/left]
in one of the rowdier inns.[/left]
[/left]
You made friends with all the regulars in the inn, but[/left]
your sympathy was won by a nervous, mute boy who kept[/left]
the bar stocked. He seemed so frightened and alone that[/left]
he reminded you of your own lonely childhood. When one[/left]
of the drunken regulars stuck the boy, you leapt to his[/left]
defense. The boy looked at you with such gratitude that[/left]
your heart almost broke. Then, a few days later, he[/left]
disappeared.[/left]
[/left]
Months later, while you were helping restock the cellar,[/left]
you were called to the front door, and there was the boy[/left]
again. This time he was dressed in Imperial robes and[/left]
surrounded by escorts including %fn.[/left]
The "mute" boy spoke in an unmistakably aristocratic[/left]
voice, "My name is Prince %imp, son of the[/left]
true Emperor of Tamriel, Uriel Septim VII. When I was[/left]
in hiding, fleeing from the wrath of the usurper Jagar[/left]
Tharn, you befriended me and saved my life. Please[/left]
accept the greatest gift the Emperor can bestow, his[/left]
gratitude."[/left]
[/left]
He also presented you with a summons from the Emperor[/left]
himself, who apparently had need of a champion such as[/left]
you. Perhaps your luck was finally beginning to change.[/left]
[/end]

Your earliest memories are of the blazing fire in the[/left]
furnace and the smell of heated metal. Your father was a[/left]
blacksmith of great renown. People from all over the[/left]
province of %hpn would come seeking his[/left]
services. As soon as you were able, you learned to help[/left]
him in the smithy. He taught you how to repair bent metal[/left]
and to keep a blade's edge sharp.[/left]
[/left]
When you were of age, you joined the local militia to see[/left]
more of the world. You excelled at the training the[/left]
militia gave you in %q1. Your knowledge[/left]
of weapon repair made you invaluable to the underfunded[/left]
militia. One day a visitor in full plate armor arrived at[/left]
the barracks. Introductions were made through the[/left]
Constable and thus you met Sir %mn. The[/left]
knight escorted you outside and %q1a.[/left]
Without a word, he brought up his mace from his belt and[/left]
levelled a blow at your head. Startled, you barely[/left]
deflected the blow. After several more blows which you[/left]
managed to avoid, the knight smiled. That was your[/left]
test. You became Sir %mn's squire[/left]
and you moved to the Imperial City.[/left]
[/left]
In the court of the Emperor, you learned many[/left]
techniques from the daily %q1 practice. To stay motivated,[/left]
%q2[/left]
and that gave you strength for the endless hours of work[/left]
and the weariness of weapon drills.[/left]
[/left]
One evening you were reading an old manuscript by a[/left]
great %q1 master, a shadow in the hall drew[/left]
your attention. Suspecting some of your fellow squires of[/left]
playing at practical jokes, you grabbed your wooden[/left]
practice sword and eased into the hall. Sneaking up behind[/left]
the shadow, you easily got close enough to push the sword[/left]
into the shadow's back.[/left]
[/left]
Despite all your training, you could not help but stop,[/left]
stunned, when the shadow hissed at you and turned, revealing[/left]
itself to be a cloaked goblin, dagger in hand. With hardly[/left]
time for a thought, your instincts took over and the[/left]
wooden sword in your hand swung out and knocked[/left]
the goblin cold. Still shaking, you called for the[/left]
guard.[/left]
[/left]
In the morning you were summoned before the Emperor.[/left]
Dressed in borrowed armor, not quite the right size you[/left]
walked into the throne room, dwarfed by its size. Bowing[/left]
before the Emperor you took the oath of knighthood and[/left]
were received into the ranks of Heraldry. It was not two[/left]
days from then that you received word that the Emperor[/left]
had a quest for you, one that required the utmost tact[/left]
and unswerving loyalty. When you came to the palace that[/left]
night, you were surprised to find that the Emperor was[/left]
not surrounded by his usual large retinue, merely his[/left]
chief advisor, the Imperial Battlemage Ocato. There you[/left]
were told of the affair of Daggerfall.[/end]

Ria Silmane was a powerful enchantress, one of the Elders[/left]
of the Imperial Council, and a worthy successor to the[/left]
Imperial Battlemage when Jagar Tharn elected to retire.[/left]
She was also a friend of yours, your first tutor in the[/left]
Imperial City. When she disappeared, you were the first[/left]
person to notice and begin an investigation. You must[/left]
have been getting close, for you were ambushed by agents[/left]
of the Emperor and thrown into a cell deep within the[/left]
sewers, with no food or water. It was there that Ria[/left]
Silmane found you.[/left]
[/left]
Ria appeared to you as a spectre, for she too had been[/left]
betrayed by the man who now, with the ultimate gall,[/left]
dared to impersonate the Emperor: Jagar Tharn, her former[/left]
master. The true Emperor was imprisoned by Tharn's magic.[/left]
Only you would be able to find the flaw in Jagar Tharn's[/left]
spell, free the Emperor, and expose the traitorous[/left]
Battlemage.[/left]
[/left]
With Ria's help, you escaped from your cell, and under her[/left]
direction, you began the quest for the Staff of Chaos.[/left]
Tharn had used the Staff to imprison the true Emperor and[/left]
had then broken it, scattering it in secure locations[/left]
throughout the Empire. Nearly ten years passed while Tharn[/left]
consolidated his power and Ria's spectral form slowly[/left]
dissolved, but at last you found all the pieces of the[/left]
Staff of Chaos and combined them to form the key to the[/left]
prison of the true Emperor. The final piece of the staff[/left]
was a gem hidden in the Imperial Palace itself.[/left]
[/left]
Jagar Tharn had surrounded himself with a host of guards,[/left]
human and otherwise. When you at last reached the gem, you[/left]
discovered why they had fought so furiously. The gem not[/left]
only freed the Emperor, but it destroyed Tharn, for the[/left]
Imperial Battlemage had used his own lifeforce to empower[/left]
the Staff.[/left]
[/left]
When the true Emperor once again assumed the throne, he[/left]
considered himself greatly in your debt. You were often[/left]
called upon to investigate evidence of Tharn's aborted[/left]
master plan, and though you discovered little of great[/left]
relevance, you were well rewarded. Still, you were not[/left]
often at court. The Emperor almost considered you a rare[/left]

[/left]
When the Emperor told you of the haunting of King[/left]
Lysandus, your instinct told you that the Emperor was[/left]
not telling you the entire story. Nevertheless, even[/left]
if he did consider you a friend, the Emperor's word was[/left]

Daggerfall.[/left]
